price: 18. Inki qangara maqida seehadayti dacrisey (namma malaykattu kinnuk) wohuh massoyseeni kay garil yanih akke waytek.
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
